attributes.action: Fund a £500 bonus for social care workers in England
attributes.additional_details: So we are all equal across the United Kingdom and recognise the NHS for working during the covid-19 pandemic and are still working.
attributes.background: The Government should fund the NHS and local authorities to provide social care staff with a one-off £500 payment, in line with similar schemes in Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
